title: Learning Design Practical Competency Strengthening: Blended Teaching Method Design for Higher Education Teaching-Learning Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can assess the political, ethical, and economic impacts of technological platforms in higher education settings and incorporate them into instructional design
Learners can design blended learning strategies based on needs analysis results
Learners can develop teachable-learning models applicable to real educational settings through project-based assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
